name: Import Permit Validation Service
description: This service simplifies the permit validation process for importers and brokers. It enables the digital validation of permits directly with the Permit Issuing Authority.

notes.title: What is the Import Permit Validation Service?
notes.body: This service simplifies the permit validation process for importers and brokers. It enables the digital validation of permits directly with the Permit Issuing Authority.

notes.title: User satisfaction
notes.body: Pre-Clearance Intervention Officers were surveyed in August/September 2016 regarding satisfaction levels together with other feedback on the service.

notes.title: Digital take-up
notes.body: Digital take-up measures the percentage of import declaration lines where a permit number was provided electronically.

widgets.name: User satisfaction
widgets.definition: Overall satisfaction score includes all ratings weighted from 100% for very satisfied, to 0% for very dissatisfied

widgets.name: Completion rate
widgets.definition: Percentage of transactions made using the digital service.

widgets.name: Time taken to clear permits
widgets.definition: Time to clear measures the time between when a good requiring an import permit was held for assessment until the time it was cleared.

widgets.name: Fact
widgets.description: Australia has experienced a significant upturn in cargo volume with incoming air cargo of 33.6 million consignments, incoming sea cargo of 3.0 million in 2014-2015.
